DoD:S is a plenty fun game, and has no major flaws. It's a lot slower-moving and less forgiving than a lot of modern FPS games, and it handles recoil pretty heavily - you can't W+M1 and expect to do well. You have to think about what you're doing and be pretty cautious. The community is kind of small, but weirdly they're the nicest, most courteous playerbase of any online game I've ever played. I feel like this is because most of them are mild-mannered suburban dads who like history. It also feels like most of them are pretty good, like they've been playing since the game came out.

Overall, it's a fun game, and while there's nothing really wrong with it, there's nothing especially great about it either - you probably won't hate the experience, but there's not much to keep you coming back either. Still, you probably won't regret picking it up, even if you just get it so you can use the textures and files for Garry's Mod. Pick it up while it's on sale.

Played this online and in clans for hundred if not thousands of hours before the days of Steam. Haven't played it for years since I lost all my Half-Life 1 and 2 disks and mods. Repurchased some of them now on Steam. After all this time it's still a pretty darn good game. If you can find a good sever with some mature players who like to cooperate it can be WAY more fun than CS. Unforutnaly there are few servers and they are mostly filled with disrespectfull and unsportsman like children who think they are "big" because they can say the "F" word.  

Modified Note:
All that being said there are a few servers and admins who promote a quality-respectful game-play and are quick to ban the immature adults and children.

I purchased this game during the Steam SUmmer Sale 2015 because I did not have enough money for Counter-Strike: Soruce. I have to say I am much more impressed by this game then I would have thought before buying it. The graphics look amazing for being years old and it offers a Counter-Strike and Team Fortress style of play. Fast paced with all classes and hilarious all around. This game seriously puts any Counter-Strike prior to CS:GO to shame. I would 100% reccomend it to any person interested in a WWII shooter.
